definition: to find amusement in one's own way/to enjoy oneself quietly
to use it (or do it) for the purpose of (allaying hunger, relieving boredom etc) to some extent
to spend one's leisure time/to idle away the time
to do sth to one's heart's content
(of an uneducated person) to mingle with the cognoscenti/to pose as a culture lover/to be a culture snob/having pretensions to culture
antiphon (i.e. solo voice answered by chorus)/sung reply (in agreement with first voice)/to reply with a poem in the same rhythm
to lead a quiet and peaceful life in retirement/to stay home with nothing to do/to lead a solitary life
to make a living by writing/to write (as an author)
to compare oneself/to view oneself as
